title: How-to
text: To use this website, hover or click on the icons for more details. Clicking on the icons will make them disappear.

title: Hello world
text: I'm anna y lin (林 she/her), a cantonese-american frontend and fullstack engineer, focused on accessibility, user experience, and challenging existing paradigms within web standards.

title: infrastructures
text: The Arc browser has transformed the way I browse the web, and organize my endless open tabs in the form of pinned tabs, folders, spaces. It has also influenced the way I think about personalized technology--there is a lot of room to reimagine hegemonic software standards and experiment with alternate infrastructures; I'm curious to explore all of it.

title: BCNY
text: I believe my background in psychology, user experience & frontend software engineering, and my experience during my masters program in creative technology will be a unique asset to the BCNY Product Engineering Fellowship Program.

title: implementation
text: I am passionate about the intersection of research, user experience, and technological implementation.

title: creative technology
text: As an undergraduate studying psychology, I participated and conducted research experiments, and taught a class on psychological research methods. However, my interest in coding led me to pursue computer science. Though I continued to graduate with a degree in psychology, I taught myself code and began working full-time as a frontend software engineer after college. After 3 years of working in software professionally, my desire to practice alternative implementations of technology led me to pursue a masters degree in creative technology at NYU.

title: teams
text: Professionally, my past work has involved working with teams, ranging from small to large, to provide access to data to a greater group of people. I have worked in all stages of development–from design, to building accessible prototypes to be used in user research, to production-ready software, as well as maintaining the codebase and pull requests.

title: projects
text: Besides software, I've also worked on hardware and other more corporeal projects.

title: resume
text: You can find more information on my resume at: annaylin.com/resume.

Thank you, and I look forward to staying in touch!

- anna

title: information
text: this site was built with custom ShadowDOM Web Components, and the viridis color palette
